website_summaries.verdict: A stunning cube bookcase that features an awe-inspiring asymmetrical design.
pros: Interlocking shelves provide ample storage space and can help you enhance a living space's decor
Storage compartments come in different sizes for added convenience
Deep cappuccino finish is sure to grab your attention
cons: Bookcase screws sometimes stick out too far

customer_reviews.title: JUST WOW
customer_reviews.text: i bought 2, expect a very heavy and long package, i needed help bringing it in the house. I get so many compliments on it. Took an hour and a half per bookcase, instructions are very detailed. Going to buy a third to stand up on the other side. Update 8/24/19: I moved into a new place, it got a few little scratches in the moving truck, you should definitely cover it when transporting or take it apart and reassemble
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONian Warrior Princess

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very sturdy. Had no problems as long as you follow the instructions and decide on which end is up. Also helps to separate all the parts into their own piles so you can easily grab what's needed next. Also, get a small bottle of wood glue or heck even school glue will work. You will run out of the glue provided by manufacturer. Other than that, set aside an hour and a glass or two of wine, and you'll be decorating in no time.
customer_reviews.author: TDRock

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I was looking for a non-typical liquor cabinet and it fits the bill beautifully. It was fairly easy to put together - I really appreciated the fact that all the holes were drilled correctly and everything lined up perfectly - no "rigging" needed, and all the parts were there. It's very heavy duty, sturdy and wonderful. I installed a wine glass rack at the top and I couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: sammygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but inadequate packaging.
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these and it's held up great for many years. We wanted to add a second one when we redecorated, but can't seem to get one to arrive without damage. The thin foam panels don't stand up to the abuse by UPS - we are on our second return and a third shelf if on the way - hopefully we can get enough parts between the two to make a single undamaged shelf.
customer_reviews.author: George Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.text: I was shorted hardware. The instructions are unclear. And it BROKE when I attempted to put it together. After I injured my wrist. Into the trash heap this goes. I bought this last spring and finally set to do it. I wasted my money for sure. Unclear instructions, shorted hardware, injured left wrist- don't waste your money. After looking at the pieces, they sure need some quality control on the manufacturing floor. I've spent years in the construction industry, specifically cabinets. I know good product when I see it. This isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Unique bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters room. She wanted something a little different, but would also give nice shelf space. Now you have to really pay attention to the directions, and I would say due to the shape it is not the quickest shelf to put together. It did take both of us to get the bookcase together, and raise it off the floor once it was assembled. There was plenty of shelf space for her collections.
customer_reviews.author: S Crow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! I was debating this vs another less ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I was debating this vs another less expensive item and I am REALLY happy with my decision! It looks Great with the Cube desk design my wife choose and she started putting it together HERSELF- it was so easy :)
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Costea

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase/Display Unit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bookcase. It is very sturdy and unique. I have the unit laying on it side and placed different vases on the shelves and a lamp and picture frames on the top. It definitely adds character to my living room. It took me just under 2 hours to put it together, I followed the directions exactly, and I did it alone. I took away a star because for some reason the manufacturer decided to put a 4x5' sticker on the side of the shelving unit and even though I removed it slowly, it took off the paint. I ended up buying paint to refinish the area rather than sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: LeoBubbles

customer_reviews.title: Warning, avoid, do not buy. This thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning, avoid, do not buy. This thing makes ikea furniture seam luxurious. Extremely cheap materials, fake wood print. On cardboard base. And when you tighten the cams it makes the piece cantilevere and makes a gap on opposite side...if I could I'd take it apart and put it back in its box and return it, but I used wood glue 150$ piece of garbage next week
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shelves in a unique configuration
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bookshelves to sit on either side of my TV-stand. Overall, these shelves are fairly easy to assemble, and only took me a few hours to assemble both by myself. They work well with the TV stand, and allow me to store books, DVDs, etc in a somewhat more interesting configuration than the traditional horizontal shelves. The quality is good, and once installed and shelved with books, they sit solidly on a carpeted surface. I did not overload the shelves, but they hold fairly large hardbound books with ease. Overall, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlockian

customer_reviews.title: Built like a poorly planned jigsaw puzzle but holds board games
customer_reviews.text: No instructions included and the ones I found online weren’t laid out well, with the labels very difficult to follow for all the different pieces. Incredibly lightweight for all the parts, and the “no formaldehyde” sticker ripped off the paint (only bonus to that was I could flip it to hide the bare piece on the bottom).
customer_reviews.author: Jack Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and am very pleased. They are heavier and sturdier than what you get from companies like Sauder or WalMart. They are a dark espresso and very nice when out together. The first one took a long time to put together but the instructions were easy to follow; it was just a lot of pieces to put together. The second went faster because we were familiar with the construction. Very sturdy. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great, decent price! I will say that if planning to put in a carpeted room, definitely consider using the wall mount feature as this shelf can become tippy if in uneven surface.
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: Coaster Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes, this come in handy....A Whole Lot. I got it assembled, though I got carried away initially and had to buy more dowels for it. I was so excited when it arrived that when I started putting it together, I was putting dowels everywhere. finally I slowed down and took my time, got it assembled. It helped open a lot of space where I had boxes that I was using as table tops. It's a very nice looking bookcase, and a great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L. Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but kinda difficult to assemble. Please make sure you use the support for the walls if it sits on carpet because it might tip over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is very sleek and contemporary which I love! It took less than 2 hours to assemble. There is definitely enough storage space for all of my college books with space left over for more books or decorative items. I like the different variations in height which can accomdate my taller books. I thought I could upload a picture but don't see that option. I have it lying horizontally on the side of my fireplace and it fits perfectly. The color is also nice and fits in well with my other furniture. This was definitely a good find for me and I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: CYH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking bookcase. Having said that, assembly is pretty difficult. Even having taken my time during the process, some parts of the lower shelves are beginning to separate now (~six months later). I'll have to take everything off the bookcase and reseat those shelves. I'd still buy this book shelf again though. It gets compliments all the time and is great for things other than books as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a "display case" until now. At $100 this thing is a steal! I shopped around a bit and this exact same design is sold in many places at a much higher price. It adds a great modern look to a room. If I didn't have a room to put it in, it'd look great in my hallway. You can basically put whatever you want on it vertically or horizontally. It was the exact color I wanted (dark brown) and pretty easy to assemble. Keep in mind, there is a sticker on one side of it that isn't meant to be taken off. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSmith

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is just fabulous. The pieces are much thicker than traditional particle board furniture. Assembly was easy. 4 stars because some of the peices had imperfections in the finish. I assembled it in such a way that any imperfections were facing the wall once finished.
customer_reviews.author: ItzJustinN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before I ordered a bookcase and I am so pleased I ordered this one. Some indicated concern with the look of the wood grain which didn't bother me at all. The spaces were exactly as I wanted. Putting together took a quick review of directions (because I usually don't read) and all the pieces are labeled perfect. Recommend a power screwdriver as it makes assembly quicker. So happy! Would also be great on its side if you need a long thing table.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to use them as room dividers and I am really impressed with the quality. They are sturdy and well polished, for the price is a great buy considering that West Elm charges more than double for similar products. Assembling was straight forward and the instructions were refreshingly clear and easy to follow. As another reviewer pointed out, Coaster should call the color "Espresso" rather than "Cappuccino" as it is dark brown rather than light brown. Thankfully that's the color I wanted for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mik Venuti

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those shelves to frame my TV and they look amazing. Be patient with assembling them, not hard but takes a little while. Great spaces for displaying art and knick knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Watership Down

customer_reviews.title: Fallen from a FIVE star review to THREE.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to assemble! Updated review: 2nd purchase. The first time, there were ZERO issues. This time, on of the sides had a crack and numerous shelves corners were smashed. For the most part, I was able to keep the smashed shelves facing the back and am currently covering the cracked side with a tall lamp but geeeeez, what happened?!
customer_reviews.author: Misa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great design, awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well-packaged with all parts. Assembly requires some basic skills and spatial thinking. Shelves are the right mix of not too heavy, yet sturdy. All parts fit nicely together. Love how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great, pricey for what I ended up with
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble, vertical pieces are not plum. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: A decorative, functional piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: We chose this bookcase because it could be used vertically or horizontally and because of the asymmetrical shelf positioning. It works very nicely with our array of non-standard volumes and files. Putting the bookcase together did take some time, and the little stick-ons to cover the screw head recesses are too small and do not stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy in Weimar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, issues with delivery
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for it to arrive and one of the shelves was dented
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Two person assembly, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was tedious. Luckily my mom did all the pegs and gluing. Putting the shelves together was easy. Pieces were clearly labeled. Used a rubber mallet to get everything right. Final result is lovely. Mom loves the decorative nature, the asymmetry adds something extra. Nice finish also.
customer_reviews.author: Kachi

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly, sturdy build, beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged extremely well. Instructions were very clear and assembly took me about 1 hour and all I needed was a screwdriver. I assembled the product myself with no issues (a major feat, since I am not mechanically inclined!). When I stood the bookcase up, it added a classic yet somewhat artistic style to my room. Love the finish of the wood.
customer_reviews.author: snoopers

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Lay pieces out to make assembly easier. Pre-assemble before gluing...thanks to all the reviewers who pointed this out. Directions are confusing...looks only some dowels get glue so we just glued 'em all! Very happy with this solid and attractive piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Groupie

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy; I did not even need the wall supports. The design looks even better in person. One of the boards did come cracked, but it was an easy touch up in a hard to see area. I was able to put it together by myself with only a Phillips and flathead in about an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe H.

customer_reviews.title: "Deep Cappuccino" more like Milk Chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item a little over two weeks ago. It arrived within the specified time, and appeared to be packaged well. The description lists the color as "deep cappuccinoo." The image shown on amazon makes the product appear to be a very dark brown - similar to the commonly found espresso colored furniture. Upon opening the box, we found that the color is actually like that of milk chocolate. The texture looks like it's flat paint. Doesn't match the image shown, so we will be returning it today. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bookcase for the price. assembly was not too bad (instructions could have been a little more clear on part and usage). Just a heads up the book shelf pieces are hollow if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: pretty but odd
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. easy to assemble and has back and front covered so you can use it in the middle of a room as a divider. particle board construction so be careful with pins and screws. very odd sized shelves. more of a display than a book case. can even be used sideways or long against the ground nice deep shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our new bookshelf. It looks sturdy enough to hold all our heavy textbooks and it's very stylish. The finish is more espresso than cappuccino, but that works out better for us since it matches our desk (which is ikea black/brown). The only issue we have is that we need to find some way to attach it to the wall because the way our carpet is makes it lean slightly forward and I'm not sure if it'll tip over if I put lots of books on it.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: big and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice shelving unit. We ended up tipping it sideways where we have it because it fits better that way. It is big. The only catch is that each piece was labeled with a sticker and one of the stickers was on the 'bottom' which for us is a side and when peeling it off it took a layer of the 'paint' off. We just face that side away from guests so its not a big deal but it takes away from the design a bit. Overall a good decision. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this bookcase. It is solid and simple to build. There is one thing I would change if I could though; the camlocks are covered by stickers that do not stay stuck. If a more substantial insert was created for these holes then this product would deserve 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B.MACK

customer_reviews.title: Like it ... but can be loved with some changes...
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is beautiful and easy to assemble. The only thing I do not like it is that there is no hardware to support this shelf along the wall so it wont fall forward. I assembled this shelf and put it in my son's room for his books and toys on a carpet floor... after a week, I noticed that this shelf has leaned forward and could have fallen on my son any time.
customer_reviews.author: RAJASHANMUGAM MADHAV

customer_reviews.title: One of the pieces was badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars if that one piece in the picture didn’t come damaged. I seriously don’t want to take the hassle of returning the furnitures as putting the pieces back into the box itself is a lot of trouble. So I simply assembled and patched the broken piece. It’s a nice book case if you are lucky to receive every pieces undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice,  but a pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: One of the panels was cracked when it arrived. I emailed and the replacement piece arrived in about a week. The directions were hard to follow and only the panels you were adding were labeled so you have to figure out what you were supposed to attach it to. The biggest issue is that some of the holes weren't deep enough and I didn't discover it until I was in the middle of putting it together and then u had to stop to get my drill to fix the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: PROS - Fast delivery - Fairly good quality for the price (should last few years) - Looks good and perfect if want to store books and other display items CONS - The color is darker than what i expected (did not care much as i wanted dark finish) - Instructions could have been better - Glue provided is not ehough you may want to have a extra wood glue handy (in case)
customer_reviews.author: Pravin

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed. Sturdy a
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy design. Looks fantastic. I have it laying longways and it looks great. Thick shelves. I assembled it by myself in a little more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Francis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf
customer_reviews.text: Really cool addition to my new place. Looks great, easy to put together, super strong and sturdy. Getting ready to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alix V

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good design and construction. But it took longer than the described 40 minutes to assemble -- maybe 3 hours. Be careful to check and recheck which shelf attaches to which and the correct side and orientation. Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality and Unique Look
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy piece of furniture that was easy to assemble. I like the way it looks in my office.
customer_reviews.author: L. Berett

customer_reviews.title: Like Them
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Bought two and put them side by side and I have a beautiful symmetrical addition to my room. They arrived in perfect condition and were not difficult to put together but agree with other reviewers that the sticker on the side should be removed with extreme care since it will remove the finish very easily. This is especially important if you plan to use them in a horizontal position where any damage you do by removing it will be obvious.
customer_reviews.author: eag8569

customer_reviews.title: love this bookcase- my dad helped me put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: love this bookcase- my dad helped me put it together because I have medical issues with my hands and don't have the strength to put in all the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these bookshelves. They were a bit taller than I had thought, but they look great in the living room space. I love how different each shelf space looks, it great for books and for decorating. It perfectly matches all of my other furniture pieces. One thing that I do not like are the parts where the round furniture stickers have to cover. The stickers peel off very easily and so the holes become very visible. I like that there aren't any backs to the bookshelf because I can put wiring through it very easily.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Not real wood of course but for the price what do you expect? Put it together myself and it wasn't hard. I use it as a horizontal bookshelf and it looks very nice with all my things on it.
customer_reviews.author: DJVANN

customer_reviews.title: looks great from a distance
customer_reviews.text: it went together easily & from a distance it looks fine. I arranged a lot of different styles/types of books in it along with some art pieces. up close you can see the screw cover patches which makes it look a bit cheap. very thin veneer so be careful when assembling
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lay

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, we use it horizontally for a modern entryway
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: So key thing the wood nails go in the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: So key thing the wood nails go in the inside holes of all the pieces, take notice! And dont glue the parta just nake sure everything is extremly tight or it wont work at the end
customer_reviews.author: Tats98

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is beautiful. My husband put it together without any problems. It's heavy, sturdy and looks a lot more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: AngelleM

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Vision Direct. Box took a while to get here but it was because they reinforce it so well. Very impressed with the packaging. The bookcase didn't take long to put together, but be sure you know which way the pieces go, as I originally had a couple pieces on backwards before realizing my mistake. Material is the Ikea style particle board and doesn't seem very sturdy with heavy items, but it really looks great in my apartment! This bookcase has a unique appearance and priced well, may buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bookcase for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Coaster Fine Furnishings makes excellent products for the prices they charge. For less than $150, I really like the style and materials the book case is made out of. I will continue to but from this furniture maker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'donovan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly elegant
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself in about 2 1/2 hours. Following the instructions is key because of the different sizes of the shelves. I have a combination of books, vases and picture frames on display. I've had it for about 2 years now and still looks great and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeFan

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most important part(screws)
customer_reviews.text: My bookshelf came without screws. We couldn’t put it together .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't too hard to assemble this bookcase, I setup the whole thing myself within 30 minutes. I used as divider, looks great. The weight is little bit heavy because the material, but manageable. If the wood quality was better, I would get this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like the staggered shelves. Not just boring. Took some time to put together because of the staggered construction but, was kind of fun to do. Must pay attention and follow directions. Fiber board but, they look nice for the price. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter is thrilled to have this in her room. Seems sturdy, nice finish and easy to assemble though time consuming because of the multiple shelves. It took me about two hours.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece to diplay my bar.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Looks just like the picture. Easy to assemble and really big so I had to secure it to the wall with L brackets for stability. It's not real wood but still very sturdy. It has a wood veneer laminate which is perfect for liquid spills. I use it to display all our liquor bottles and people always compliment me on it.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca R Treas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookcase! It's very sturdy and looks gorgeous all set up.
customer_reviews.author: Cori08

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Interesting to put to gather. Pay attention to the details.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin  Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking shelves for my media room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these shelves initially, and have since bought two more. They are heavy and sturdy, and my media room wall looks great: modern and pretty cool - it was an easy way to update the look of a room in addition to being functional. They are heavier than expected, and a friend put them together with me since he had the power tools :). It's not hard to assemble, but certainly is time-consuming as is the case with anything if you want to do it right. bottom line, you get more for your money than you think you will and I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: texaschristina

customer_reviews.title: looks nice in my living room
customer_reviews.text: looks nice in my living room, funny plastic smell went away after about a week - not the easiest assembly as there was not much text, but i figured it out pretty quickly. no bowing of shelves thus far
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: So cute, great value for the price! Was overwhelmed when I first opened the box and started to assemble, but it actually went together very quickly and easily and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was easy to put together (assembled it while watching a movie on TV), sturdy, holds different sizes of books, and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the ease of putting together. Looks great after assembly as well. Bought for son's room and he loves the contemporary look.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I was the last piece of the mosaic
customer_reviews.text: We moved recently and I got an absolutely empty room. I bought all my furniture but there was a corner left. And I purchased this item. I gave the room view of completeness. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D.P.Josephson

customer_reviews.title: So much better then what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: So much better then what I was expecting! Easy to put together if you follow the directions very carefully. Seems sturdy and has a nice shiny finish.
customer_reviews.author: Sabby D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture. I use it on its side as a tv stand and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like said item... except the color was lighter
customer_reviews.text: The item itself looks pretty nice when setup and completed, but the intructions were a picture of completed bookcase and that's it... nothing more. Also the color was a couple shades lighter, please keep that in mind when buying this.
customer_reviews.author: LobsterBoyBob

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and works just fine "tipped" over on it's side for a long bookshelf.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and works just fine "tipped" over on it's side for a long bookshelf. very heavy for one person to move
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and sturdy. Good looking. Just don't expect to put too much stuff on it because the space on each shelf is not all usable. It is designed to look interesting and unusual, I guess. And it does look so.
customer_reviews.author: HRY

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves. They were relatively easy to assemble. They look awesome and are very sturdy! Definitely a great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Camille L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and was easy to put together. Looks super cool and is very sturdy. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were very clear with good illustrations. This 70 yr
customer_reviews.text: Came packed very well. Instructions were very clear with good illustrations. This 70 yr. old grandmother put it together by her self. I only needed help to stand it up when complete, it's heavy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect, easily to assemble. matches perfectly with my current shelf
customer_reviews.author: citizen51

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: These bookshelves are definitely a step above the stuff you get at Walmart and Target and are worth the bigger price tag. Everything was well packaged; not a ding or nick on anything. Once assembled they make for some eye catching book arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have this as our living room unit with TV mounted above.Works great with my decor and displays vases/picture frames/books
customer_reviews.author: TembKost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this and I get so many compliments. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, decorative, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for decoration and also to put a lot of books, dvds, and games on. It is VERY sturdy...I lifted it by the shelves with everything on and it was solid. Shelves are wide, allowing for 2 rows of dvds or books if you choose. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: erin n kraemer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another if I had a place to put it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Shelves are 1" thick. A little hard to put together, but results were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: pdeagan

customer_reviews.title: Cube Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is incredible. It was a slight challenge to assemble, but once done, it looks GREAT ! I am thrilled to have purchased this bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase looks great and is quite impressive. It looks and feels sturdy enough to handle bigger and heavier books/items to be displayed. Everyone seems to think it's pretty cool and modern. I was a bit confused with some of the assembly instructions but I was easily able to dismantle parts of it and put it together the correct way without damaging anything.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This fit my living room decor perfectly and the hubby put it together pretty easily. This is also a very sturdy piece once all assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Ash727

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf is more solid than I expected. My wife assembled it in an hour and had no complaints about how it went together. I'm very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: It looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any trouble assembling it. It looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to contact the seller multiple times. Received the bookcase without assembly instructions - a total nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is very solidly built and great for the price. It was a little confusing to put together, but not too bad. I set mine up on its side and it looks great, but the sticker on the bottom ended up on the side and when I pulled it off it took a lot of the laminate with it. I just covered it with furniture marker. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase! Easy to assemble and very stable when ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bookcase! Easy to assemble and very stable when standing alone. No need to attach to wall. Love the look of the different shapes and sizes of the shelves. Gives it a very contemporary and unique look.
customer_reviews.author: Chili

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bookshelf to display art. The only thing I dislike is that the screw holes show and I'm not fond of the little paper covers.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't difficult to put together and we set it horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Nyah

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: This is like a chunky, funky contemporary bookcase, well worth the money. I would buy more if I had the space.
customer_reviews.author: Juleski

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: it looks very nice in our living room. I wouldn't say it is extremely sturdy, but otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Shipping/processing felt as though it took forever. Quick communication from seller. Arrived via Fedex packaged well and undamaged (always a plus) the box is extremely heavy. Purchased for our home office, looks nice (not amazing, not bad - just average) -Ikea meets Target... Fairly sturdy piece by looking at it, but if you touch it you can tell the cheap materials that it is really made out of. I am not disappointed in the purchase, but I'm not sure that going back I would re-purchase either. I cannot attest to the level of difficulty to put together, however it did take my experienced construction worker/hired helper nearly two hours to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: dkep2001

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bookcase for the price. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Is a deep espresso color which is exactly what we wanted. Only thing I wish it had was a mechanism to attach to wall for added security with a lil one running around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome buy! My husband had no trouble putting it together and we are using it on it's side. It looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: CF02

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this book shelf. The instructions were easy to follow. The book shelf is great quality considering how inexpensive it is. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shayo

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of the book shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the book shelf. It took awhile for my husband to put it together but the outcome was worth it for the price I paid for. Good quality wood and very steady. The size is perfect for any room. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecille De Los Reyes

product_meta.title: Asymmetrical Cube 8-shelf Bookcase Cappuccino
product_meta.description: Stately, sturdy, and strong, this bookcase is an excellent choice for a library or living room. Featuring eight convenient shelves, it offers lots of space for storage. The shelves are arranged in a bold, geometric design, giving it a modern appearance. It's available in six stunning colors to accentuate any decor. Constructed from high-quality materials, this bookcase is a safe spot to store your most precious belongings.
feature_bullets: Materials: Hollow board with honey comb, Paper Veneer, Particle and MDF
